name: Crowned Heads - CHC Serie E - Hermoso No. 2
additionalNotes: Paying homage to the famous musician Eddie Van Halen and his iconic guitar solo “Eruption”, Crowned Heads CHC Serie E is a premium cigar that hits all the right notes.
